meanings.definition: Of or relating to the tail
meanings.sent1: The caudal fin helps the fish swim smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The cat's caudal movements showed its excitement.
meanings.sent3: The caudal wag of the dog's tail made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The caudal end of the kite fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel's caudal appendage was fluffy and bushy.

meanings.definition: Situated in or directed toward the hind part of the body
meanings.sent1: The caudal vertebrae provide support to the lower back.
meanings.sent2: The kangaroo's caudal muscles help it hop efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The caudal position of the chair made it perfect for relaxation.
meanings.sent4: The caudal region of the map was marked with a star.
meanings.sent5: The caudal side of the room had a cozy fireplace.
